mapper.select: /* 메인 비주얼 조회 */ SELECT ROWNUM AS ROWNUMBER , VISUAL_PAGE.* FROM ( SELECT VISUAL.MAIN_SN AS MAIN_SN , VISUAL.MAIN_CN AS MAIN_CN , VISUAL.EXPSR_YN AS EXPSR_YN , VISUAL.SORT_NO AS SORT_NO , FILES.ORGNL_FILE_NM AS ORIGIN_FILE_NAME , FILES.FILE_NM AS MAIN_FILE_NAME , FILES.FILE_PATH AS MAIN_PATH FROM KB_MAIN_INFO VISUAL , KB_FILE_INFO FILES WHERE VISUAL.ATCH_FILE_SN = FILES.FILE_SN(+) ORDER BY MAIN_SN ASC ) VISUAL_PAGE ORDER BY ROWNUMBER DESC

/* 메인 비주얼 상세 조회 */ SELECT VISUAL.MAIN_SN AS MAIN_SN , VISUAL.MAIN_CN AS MAIN_CN , VISUAL.EXPSR_YN AS EXPSR_YN , VISUAL.SORT_NO AS SORT_NO , FILES.FILE_SN AS ATCH_FILE_SN , FILES.ORGNL_FILE_NM AS ORIGIN_FILE_NAME , FILES.FILE_NM AS MAIN_FILE_NAME , FILES.FILE_PATH AS MAIN_PATH FROM KB_MAIN_INFO VISUAL , KB_FILE_INFO FILES WHERE VISUAL.ATCH_FILE_SN = FILES.FILE_SN(+) AND VISUAL.MAIN_SN = #{main_sn}
